db_read_sql_select: SELECT 'kofax' AS source,'INST' AS form_type,b.header_id AS file_header_id,b.ub_id AS bill_header_id,CASE WHEN b.invoice_number REGEXP '^[0-9]+$' THEN CAST(b.invoice_number AS UNSIGNED) ELSE NULL END AS txm_invoice_number,b.receive_date AS date_bill_received_by_payer,b.special_handling,b.claim_number AS txm_claim_number,b.claim_number AS reported_claim_number,SUBSTRING(b.type_of_bill, 1, 2) AS facility_code,SUBSTRING(b.type_of_bill, 3, 1) AS bill_frequency_type_code,b.creation_date AS date_of_bill FROM txm_bitx_kofax_staging.kofax_ub04 b WHERE b.header_id = <INPUT_FILE_HEADER_ID>

SELECT b.ub_id AS bill_header_id,CASE WHEN b.patient_middle_name IS NOT NULL AND b.patient_middle_name<>'' THEN CONCAT(b.patient_last_name,',',b.patient_first_name,' ',LEFT(b.patient_middle_name,1)) ELSE CONCAT(b.patient_last_name,', ',b.patient_first_name) END AS patient_name ,b.control_number AS patient_control_number,b.patient_date_of_injury AS date_of_injury,b.patient_dob AS date_of_birth FROM txm_bitx_kofax_staging.kofax_ub04 b WHERE b.header_id = <INPUT_FILE_HEADER_ID>
transform_sql_select: SELECT h.bill_id,v.patient_name,v.patient_control_number,v.date_of_injury,v.date_of_birth FROM read_patient_vw v JOIN db_bill_header_vw h ON h.bill_header_id=v.bill_header_id AND h.form_type = 'INST'

db_read_sql_select: SELECT k.ub_id AS bill_header_id,CAST(k.vendor_npi AS CHAR) AS vendor_npi,k.vendor_other_id,k.attending_provider_last_name, k.attending_provider_first_name,CAST(k.operating_provider_national_provider_id AS CHAR) AS operating_provider_national_provider_id,CAST(k.attending_provider_national_provider_id AS CHAR) AS referring_provider_npi,k.attending_provider_other_id AS referring_provider_other_id,k.attending_provider_other_id AS referring_provider_state_license,k.operating_provider_first_name,k.operating_provider_last_name,k.operating_provider_other_id,CASE WHEN pp.provider_number IS NOT NULL THEN pp.provider_number ELSE CAST(k.provider_id AS CHAR) END AS provider_number,CASE WHEN pp.provider_number IS NOT NULL THEN pp.rendering_provider_npi ELSE NULL END AS rendering_provider_npi,CASE WHEN pp.provider_number IS NOT NULL THEN pp.rendering_provider_name ELSE NULL END AS rendering_provider_name,CASE WHEN pp.provider_number IS NOT NULL THEN pp.rendering_provider_license ELSE NULL END AS rendering_provider_license,CASE WHEN pp.provider_number IS NOT NULL THEN pp.vendor_phone ELSE NULL END AS vendor_phone_number,CASE WHEN pp.provider_number IS NOT NULL THEN pp.vendor_number ELSE NULL END AS vendor_number,CASE WHEN pp.provider_number IS NOT NULL THEN pp.vendor_name ELSE k.vendor_name END AS vendor_name,CASE WHEN pp.provider_number IS NOT NULL THEN pp.vendor_address1 ELSE k.vendor_address_1 END AS vendor_address_1,CASE WHEN pp.provider_number IS NOT NULL THEN pp.vendor_address2 ELSE k.vendor_address_2 END AS vendor_address_2,CASE WHEN pp.provider_number IS NOT NULL THEN pp.vendor_city ELSE k.vendor_city END AS vendor_city,CASE WHEN pp.provider_number IS NOT NULL THEN pp.vendor_state ELSE k.vendor_state END AS vendor_state,CASE WHEN pp.provider_number IS NOT NULL THEN pp.vendor_zip_code ELSE k.vendor_zip_code END AS vendor_zip_code,CASE WHEN pp.provider_number IS NOT NULL THEN pp.vendor_tax_id ELSE k.vendor_federal_employer_id_number END AS vendor_tax_id,CASE WHEN pp.provider_number IS NOT NULL THEN pp.facility_name ELSE k.facility_name END AS facility_name,CASE WHEN pp.provider_number IS NOT NULL THEN pp.facility_npi ELSE NULL END AS facility_npi,CASE WHEN pp.provider_number IS NOT NULL THEN pp.facility_address_1 ELSE k.facility_address_1 END AS facility_address_1,CASE WHEN pp.provider_number IS NOT NULL THEN pp.facility_address_2 ELSE k.facility_address_2 END AS facility_address_2,CASE WHEN pp.provider_number IS NOT NULL THEN pp.facility_city ELSE k.facility_city END AS facility_city,CASE WHEN pp.provider_number IS NOT NULL THEN pp.facility_state ELSE k.facility_state END AS facility_state,CASE WHEN pp.provider_number IS NOT NULL THEN pp.facility_zip_code ELSE k.facility_zip_code END AS facility_zip_code FROM txm_bitx_kofax_staging.kofax_ub04 k LEFT JOIN txm_bitx_provider.provider pp ON k.provider_id = pp.provider_number WHERE k.header_id = <INPUT_FILE_HEADER_ID>
transform_sql_select: SELECT h.bill_id,v.facility_name,v.facility_npi,v.facility_address_1,v.facility_address_2,v.facility_city,v.facility_state,v.facility_zip_code,v.rendering_provider_npi,v.rendering_provider_name,v.rendering_provider_license,v.vendor_phone_number,v.vendor_number,v.vendor_name,v.vendor_address_1,v.vendor_address_2,v.vendor_city,v.vendor_state,v.vendor_zip_code,v.vendor_tax_id,v.vendor_npi,v.vendor_other_id,get_provider_name_udf(v.attending_provider_last_name, v.attending_provider_first_name, '', '') AS referring_provider_name,v.referring_provider_npi,v.referring_provider_other_id,v.referring_provider_state_license,v.operating_provider_first_name,v.operating_provider_last_name,v.operating_provider_national_provider_id,v.operating_provider_other_id,v.provider_number FROM read_provider_vw v JOIN db_bill_header_vw h ON h.bill_header_id=v.bill_header_id AND h.form_type = 'INST'

db_read_sql_select: SELECT b.ub_id AS bill_header_id,b.diagnosis_admitting_code AS admitting_diagnosis_code,b.diagnosis_visit_reason_code,b.type_of_bill,CASE WHEN b.statement_from = '0000-00-00' THEN NULL ELSE b.statement_from END AS from_service_bill_date,CASE WHEN b.statement_to = '0000-00-00' THEN NULL ELSE b.statement_to END AS thru_service_bill_date,CASE WHEN b.admission_date = '0000-00-00' THEN NULL ELSE b.admission_date END AS admission_date,LPAD(CAST(b.admission_hour AS CHAR), 2, 0) AS admission_hour,b.admission_type,b.discharge_status AS patient_discharge_status,b.pps_code FROM txm_bitx_kofax_staging.kofax_ub04 b WHERE b.header_id = <INPUT_FILE_HEADER_ID>
transform_sql_select: SELECT h.bill_id,v.admitting_diagnosis_code,v.diagnosis_visit_reason_code,v.type_of_bill,v.from_service_bill_date,v.thru_service_bill_date,v.admission_date,v.admission_hour,v.admission_type,v.patient_discharge_status,v.pps_code FROM read_hospitalization_treatment_vw v JOIN db_bill_header_vw h ON h.bill_header_id=v.bill_header_id AND h.form_type = 'INST'

db_read_sql_select: SELECT b.ub_id as bill_header_id,l.ub_line_id AS bill_detail_record_id,l.description,l.hcpcs_code AS procedure_code,CASE WHEN l.service_date IS NULL THEN NULLIF(b.statement_from, '0000-00-00') ELSE l.service_date END AS service_from_date,NULLIF(b.statement_to, '0000-00-00') AS service_thru_date,l.units_service AS units_of_service,l.total_charge,l.revenue_code,l.sequence_number AS line_number,l.modifier1 AS hcpcs_modifier_code_1,l.modifier2 AS hcpcs_modifier_code_2,l.modifier3 AS hcpcs_modifier_code_3,l.modifier4 AS hcpcs_modifier_code_4 FROM txm_bitx_kofax_staging.kofax_ub04 b JOIN txm_bitx_kofax_staging.kofax_ub04_line l ON l.ub_id=b.ub_id WHERE b.header_id = <INPUT_FILE_HEADER_ID>
transform_sql_select: SELECT t.hospitalization_treatment_id,h.bill_id,v.description,v.procedure_code,v.service_from_date,v.service_thru_date,CASE WHEN li.anesthesia_code <> '' THEN v.units_of_service * CAST(af.attribute_value AS INT) * CAST(li.anesthesia_code AS INT) ELSE v.units_of_service END AS units_of_service,v.total_charge,v.revenue_code,v.line_number,v.hcpcs_modifier_code_1,v.hcpcs_modifier_code_2,v.hcpcs_modifier_code_3,v.hcpcs_modifier_code_4 FROM read_hospitalization_treatment_line_vw v JOIN db_bill_header_vw h ON h.bill_header_id=v.bill_header_id AND h.form_type = 'INST' JOIN db_hospitalization_treatment_vw t ON t.bill_id = h.bill_id LEFT JOIN line_item_breakdown_vw li ON li.procedure_code <= v.revenue_code AND li.end_procedure_code >= v.revenue_code AND li.record_type = 'R' LEFT JOIN common_static_configuration_vw af ON af.attribute_name = 'Anesfac'

db_read_sql_select: SELECT b.ub_id AS bill_header_id, CASE WHEN b.diagnosis_icd_indicator = '0' or b.diagnosis_icd_indicator = '' THEN 'ICD10' WHEN b.diagnosis_icd_indicator = '9' THEN 'ICD9' END AS diagnosis_code_qualifier_icd, 1 AS sequence_number, NULLIF(TRIM(diagnosis_principal_code), '') AS diagnosis_code FROM txm_bitx_kofax_staging.kofax_ub04 b WHERE b.header_id = <INPUT_FILE_HEADER_ID> transform_sql_select: SELECT h.bill_id, 'DIAGNOSTIC' AS code_type, v.sequence_number, v.diagnosis_code_qualifier_icd, v.diagnosis_code FROM read_billing_codes_vw v JOIN db_bill_header_vw h ON h.bill_header_id = v.bill_header_id AND h.form_type = 'INST'

db_read_sql_select: SELECT b.ub_id AS bill_header_id, 1 AS sequence_number, NULLIF(TRIM(procedures_principal_code), '') AS procedure_code,procedures_principal_date AS procedure_date FROM txm_bitx_kofax_staging.kofax_ub04 b WHERE b.header_id = <INPUT_FILE_HEADER_ID> UNION ALL SELECT b.ub_id AS bill_header_id, 2 AS sequence_number,NULLIF(TRIM(procedures_other_code_A), '')  AS procedure_code,procedures_other_date_A AS procedure_date FROM txm_bitx_kofax_staging.kofax_ub04 b WHERE b.header_id = <INPUT_FILE_HEADER_ID> UNION ALL SELECT b.ub_id AS bill_header_id, 3 AS sequence_number,NULLIF(TRIM(procedures_other_code_B), '') AS procedure_code,procedures_other_date_B AS procedure_date FROM txm_bitx_kofax_staging.kofax_ub04 b WHERE b.header_id = <INPUT_FILE_HEADER_ID> UNION ALL SELECT b.ub_id AS bill_header_id, 4 AS sequence_number,NULLIF(TRIM(procedures_other_code_C), '')  AS procedure_code,procedures_other_date_C AS procedure_date FROM txm_bitx_kofax_staging.kofax_ub04 b WHERE b.header_id = <INPUT_FILE_HEADER_ID> UNION ALL SELECT b.ub_id AS bill_header_id, 5 AS sequence_number,NULLIF(TRIM(procedures_other_code_D), '')  AS procedure_code,procedures_other_date_D AS procedure_date FROM txm_bitx_kofax_staging.kofax_ub04 b WHERE b.header_id = <INPUT_FILE_HEADER_ID> UNION ALL SELECT b.ub_id AS bill_header_id, 6 AS sequence_number,NULLIF(TRIM(procedures_other_code_E), '')  AS procedure_code,procedures_other_date_E AS procedure_date FROM txm_bitx_kofax_staging.kofax_ub04 b WHERE b.header_id = <INPUT_FILE_HEADER_ID>
transform_sql_select: SELECT h.bill_id, 'PROCEDURE' AS code_type, v.sequence_number, v.procedure_code, v.procedure_date FROM read_billing_codes_vw v JOIN db_bill_header_vw h ON h.bill_header_id = v.bill_header_id AND h.form_type = 'INST'

db_read_sql_select: SELECT b.ub_id AS bill_header_id,a.document_item_type AS txm_doc_type,a.serial_number AS document_serial_number FROM txm_bitx_kofax_staging.kofax_ub04 b JOIN txm_bitx_kofax_staging.kofax_ub04_attachments a ON b.ub_id = a.ub_id WHERE b.header_id = <INPUT_FILE_HEADER_ID>
transform_sql_select: SELECT h.bill_id,d.txm_doc_type,d.document_serial_number FROM read_billing_documents_vw d JOIN db_bill_header_vw h ON h.bill_header_id=d.bill_header_id AND h.form_type = 'INST'
